text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Degraded automated After Call Work timeout experience>
We are investigating degraded experience on automated After Call Work timeout for some agents handling contacts in the US-EAST-1 Region. If an agent is affected, they can flip to Available manually to continue taking contacts as a work around. All other Amazon Connect functionality is working normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Degraded automated After Call Work timeout experience>
We continue to investigate degraded experience on automated After Call Work timeout for some agents handling contacts in the US-EAST-1 Region. All other Amazon Connect functionality is working normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Degraded automated After Call Work timeout experience>
We have remediated the issue causing a degraded experience in automated After Call Work timeout for some agents in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
